name: Ensaladang Kamatis
description: Ensaladang Kamatis is a delightful, refreshing salad perfect for those adhering to low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diets. This Healthified recipe is not only simple to make but brings a burst of flavors that perfectly complement any meal, making it ideal for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes without sacrificing taste.
recipeIngredient: 0.50 medium (approx 2-3/4" long, 2-1/2" dia), Peppers, sweet, green, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by preparing your ingredients: finely chop the red onions, dice the green peppers, and slice the tomatoes into wedges.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped red onions, diced green peppers, and tomato wedges.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix together 2 teaspoons of coconut sugar with 2 tablespoons of cane vinegar until the sugar is completely dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the vinegar and sugar mixture over the vegetables and gently toss to combine, ensuring all the ingredients are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Allow the salad to sit for about 10 minutes to marinate, enhancing the flavors of the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Ensaladang Kamatis chilled or at room temperature as a refreshing side dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
